Description: Fragment of amygdaloid handle at neck join, with gradual turn, from a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine pink-buff; blue-grey core; cream slip. Diamond stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription and sceptre symbol.
Type series: KT971 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Curator's comments: Names Diokles and Menestratos. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 201, 48
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0326)
